description: This Java class defines a Spring Boot REST controller named AnalyticsController, providing endpoints for retrieving KPI summaries and timeseries data related to invoices and analytics. It handles HTTP GET requests at /api/analytics/summary and /api/analytics/timeseries, utilizing annotations for API documentation and security configurations.

classes.name: AnalyticsController
classes.description: A REST controller exposing endpoints for KPI and timeseries analytics related to invoices, secured with role-based access control and documented with OpenAPI annotations.

methods.name: summary
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve KPI summary metrics, supporting optional filtering by partner ID, date range, and invoice status.

methods.name: timeseries
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve monthly timeseries data for specified metrics ('invoiced' or 'paid'), with optional filters for partner ID, date range, and invoice status.
